products.title: Genesis Black Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Genesis Black Electric Roller Blind in Black. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. 
 
This crisp black roller blind will look great in any room in your home and will add a touch of style. The electric aspect of this blind makes it easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1786 Fabric Colour: Black Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Genesis Blackout Black Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Genesis Blackout Black Electric Roller Blind in Black. Made to measure from £123.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Genesis Blackout range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. 
 
This black roller blind is effortlessly stylish and is also made from blackout fabric so will help to keep the light out of rooms when you want to keep them dark. The electric aspect of this blind makes it easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1780 Fabric Colour: Black Material: 100% Polyester Lining: White Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.productdescription:
A durable, moisture resistant and long lasting collection that is available in a range of stunning shades.  
 
This black roller blind is very durable and the perfect choice for your bathroom as it is moisture resistant.The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for difficult to reach windows.

products.title: Bella Blackout Black Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Black Electric Roller Blind. Made to measure from £138.17 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, our Bella Blackout Black electric roller blind blends minimal style with practical design.  A firm favourite, our Bella Blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - Whether its blackout electric roller blinds in the bedroom,  in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Due to their chain-free control options our electric roller blinds are Inherently child-safe by design, and if you upgrade with the Smart Home Hub, our electric roller blinds become controllable with your mobile phone. 
 
At Swift Direct Blind, quality comes first.  Our roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by our roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do our blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2043 Fabric Colour: Black Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
